game.logic

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.logic.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    Contains the deck, hand and table of a player. Keeps track of the player's influence and resources. Every game has 2 players. Player number 1 is at bottom, 2 is at top. Bottom player always starts.
    Author:
    Eero Kuurne

    • Method Detail

      • changeRemainingInfluence

        public void changeRemainingInfluence(int amount)
        Changes the influence of the player based on parameter amount. Negative values for losing influence.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of influence to change.

      • changeMaxResources

        public void changeMaxResources(int amount)
        Changes the resources of the player based on parameter amount. Max. resources is defined here.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of resources to change.

      • changeMaxTurnResources

        public void changeMaxTurnResources(int amount)
        Changes the maximum possible resources without workers on this turn.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of resources to change.

      • changeRemainingResources

        public void changeRemainingResources(int amount)
        Changes remaining resources.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of resources to change.

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(Graphics g,
                           int player,
                           int turn,
                           boolean betweenTurns)
        Paints the player's deck, hand and table.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics drawing tool.
        player - 1 for player at bottom, 2 for top.
        turn - Current turn.
        betweenTurns - State between endturn and startturn.

      • paintInfluence

        public void paintInfluence(Graphics g,
                           int player)
        Paints the influence text and bar based on maximum and remaining influence.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics painting tool.
        player - The player whose influence is being painted.

      • paintResources

        public void paintResources(Graphics g,
                           int player)
        Paints the resources text and bar based on maximum and remaining resources.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics painting tool.
        player - The player whose resources is being painted.
